attributes.review: this app is so disgusting. i felt like my fingers were cursed from just clicking “download.” i very much hate this and i will never want to download it again. it’s such a waste of time and no one wants to listen to what a 🐷 wants to say. i hate republicans and trump supporters with my whole heart ❤️ hope this gets removed because it’s not worth it at all. only worth so you can vote it a 1 star🙈🧚🏼✨
attributes.title: chile...

attributes.review: i downloaded because Trump is literally my soulmate. when i first opened it everything in my room set in fire and my cat walked in screaming in a demonic voice “WELCOME TO HELL” needless to say i now don’t have a house and my cat is now orange.
attributes.title: worst app on planet earth ❤️

attributes.review: Constantly crashing. Phone number? Crashes. Help button? Crashes. Delete and re download? Doesn’t help. Garbage app for a garbage man. Man wants a fascist police state. Black lives matter 🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.title: Crashes

attributes.review: All the images that appeared on this app were horrifying! The app is filled with many stupid people and comments. It was a true waste of my time. I would not recommend
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: I got a private message saying the most racist slurs because I have a hispanic name when i signed up. They used “🤡🤡” emojis everytime i tried to defend myself. Comebacks were trash 0/10, my mom can roast me better.
attributes.title: Racist

attributes.review: I downloaded this despicable app and then my sweet rat boy named ratty patty passed away while looking at Donald ducks face. 🤧🤧🤧 I cannot believe his ugly face murdered my innocent ratty patty 😢 this app is atrocious and can’t be trusted along with Donald Duck. He was a sweet little rat boy who hated the sight of ugly Doritos. RIP SWEET GUY 🥺
attributes.title: Pet rat died 😭😭😭 don’t download 😤

attributes.review: This app took 10 weeks to download and This cause my friends to pass out because he needed help but when I was downloaded it I cauldron do anything else .Black Lives Matter Biden 2020

attributes.review: First we don’t need a big Cheeto roaming around our App Store, and this app made my iPad GLITCH so bad nothing worked anymore. I was scrolling threw tik tok seeing that he was gunna take it down so let’s try and twist his mind!!
